Ideja za kosilo: lečna juha z gobami
Za vrhunski okus dodamo pest suhih jurčkov.
05 Nov 2019, 10:59 by A. K.
V prihajajoči sezoni jedi na žlico ne pozabimo na lečo, stročnico odličnega okusa in široke uporabnosti. V primerjavi z drugimi suhimi stročnicami v zrnju, denimo fižolom, čičeriko ali sojo, je mnogo prej kuhana, pa še namakati je ni treba. Tako da je lahko tudi izbira za pripravo jedi po hitrem navdihu.Za 4 osebe:250 g šampinjonov1 pest suhih jurčkov1 skodelica leče1 čebula3 stroki česna1 večji korenček2 žlici paradižnikove omakesol, poper, oljerožmarin, kuminasveži peteršiljŠampinjone očistimo in narežemo na lističe, jurčke namočimo. Čebulo in česen olupimo, nasekljamo in svetlo prepražimo na olju. Dodamo na kocke narezano korenje in gobe ter dušimo nekaj minut. Zalijemo z vodo, dodamo paradižnik, kumino in vejico rožmarina, solimo in popramo ter počakamo, da zavre. V juho stresemo oprano lečo in kuhamo slabe pol ure. Jed mora biti gostljata. Potresemo s svežim sesekljanim peteršiljem.Gosta enolončnica bo kuhana v pol ure, če uporabimo rdečo lečo, pa še prej. Leča bo jed hkrati zgostila, tako da ni treba narediti podmeta iz moke. Zelo dobro se ujame z jesenskimi plodovi, na primer gobami in bučami, ter z različnimi vrstami zelenjave. Seveda jo lahko pripravimo tudi z mesom, bodisi kot prilogo bodisi v enolončnici.

Lunch Idea: Lentil mushroom soup
Add a handful of dried horseradish for the ultimate taste.
05 Nov 2019, 10:59 by A.K.
In the coming season, spoon dishes are not to be forgotten about lentils, legumes of excellent taste and wide applicability. Compared to other dried legumes such as beans, chickpeas or soybeans, it is cooked much earlier and does not need to be irrigated. So it can also be a quick-inspiration choice. For 4 people: 250 g mushrooms1 fist of dry soup1 cup of lentils1 onion3 cloves of garlic1 larger carrot2 tablespoons tomatoes omakesole, pepper, oil marinade, cumin fresh parsley, champignons peppercorns. Peel the onions and garlic, chop them and lightly fry in oil. Add the diced carrots and mushrooms and simmer for a few minutes. Pour in water, add tomatoes, cumin and a sprig of rosemary, salt and pepper and wait for it to boil. Shake the washed lentils in the soup and cook for half an hour. The dish must be a guest. Sprinkle with fresh chopped parsley. The stew will be cooked in half an hour, if using a red lens, even sooner. The lentil will thicken the dish at the same time, so you don't have to make a flour pan. It goes well with autumn fruits, such as mushrooms and pumpkins, and various types of vegetables. Of course, it can also be cooked with meat, either as a side dish or in a stew.
